sentences.en: Before you go near a stockbroker, do your homework.
sentences.cn: 找股票经纪人之前，先要做好必要的准备工作。

sentences.en: Bobby is going about his homework very seriously tonight.
sentences.cn: 鲍比今天晚上在非常认真地做功课.

sentences.en: For homework, finish the exercise on page 14.
sentences.cn: 家庭作业是完成第14页的练习。

sentences.en: Fred stuck with his homework until it was done.
sentences.cn: 弗雷德继续做他的作业,直到做完为止.

sentences.en: He's always pestering me to help him with his homework.
sentences.cn: 他总是泡蘑菇要我帮他做作业.

sentences.en: His mother kept him in until he had finished his homework.
sentences.cn: 他母亲把他关在家里,直到他做完家庭作业.

sentences.en: I have to do a lot of homework for tomorrow's meeting.
sentences.cn: 明天要开会,我还要做许多准备工作.

sentences.en: I still haven't done my geography homework.
sentences.cn: 我还没做完地理科家庭作业呢。

sentences.en: I suppose I'd better do some homework.
I'll do my homework after supper.
sentences.cn: 晚饭后我要做家庭作业。

sentences.en: If you are not careful, children tend to neglect their homework.
sentences.cn: 如果你不注意的话，孩子们往往会不重视他们的家庭作业。

sentences.en: She's been beavering away at her homework for hours.
sentences.cn: 她连续几个小时都在忙着写作业.

sentences.en: The teacher has excused the students from their homework for this evening.
sentences.cn: 那位老师已经同意学生们今晚不做作业.

sentences.en: The teacher insisted on all the homework being handed in on Monday.
sentences.cn: 老师坚持要求所有作业都要在星期一交上来.

sentences.en: Tom admits that playing video games sometimes distracts him from his homework.
sentences.cn: 汤姆承认玩电子游戏有时会使他无心做作业。

sentences.en: When teachers assign homework, students usually feel an obligation to do it.
sentences.cn: 当老师布置家庭作业的时候，学生们通常觉得做作业是分内之事。

words.tran_cn: 舒适的；家庭似的；自在的

phrases.tran_cn: 做作业，做功课；做家庭作业

trans.tran_en: work that a student at school is asked to do at home
